description: Allow strong speed/trainer horses to retain high scores even if tagged as 'Failed as favorite'
active_in: All sprint races with avgSpeed > 70 and trainerScore > 0.7

feature: Best Dirt Speed + Top Pace Bonus
description: Adds a bonus when a horse has 'Best Dirt Speed' and is the early pace leader, provided there are no major negatives.
active_in: Dirt sprints (<=6f), Maiden Special Weight or Claiming
